title: PIL in Bombay High Court seeks court-monitored probe into plane crash - Bar and Bench
description: The Bombay High Court's petition seeking a court-monitored investigation into the plane crash involving Ajit Pawar. This article explores the legal proceedings
content:
#### Background A prominent case has been brought before the Bombay High Court where PIL (Petition for Writ of Mercy) is being heard by the Bar Council and Bench of Judges. The petition, filed by family members of the deceased, Ajit Pawar, seeks a court-monitored probe into the circumstances leading up to his death in a plane crash that occurred on March 25th.

The incident unfolded during a business meeting where Rohit Pawar was allegedly involved in some controversial activities, which are now being questioned by the family members. The police have been accused of not registering an FIR (First Information Report) at the time and sending the complaint to the State CID (Crime Investigation Department).

#### Key Developments The case has garnered significant attention from media outlets due to its high-profile nature and potential for legal challenges. Here are some notable developments:

1. Family Members' Petition: The family of Ajit Pawar, including his relatives, filed a PIL in the Bombay High Court seeking a court-monitored probe into the plane crash. This petition aims to ensure transparency and fairness in the investigation process.

2. Police Allegations: The police have been accused of not registering an FIR at the time of the incident due to some procedural lapses. Additionally, they are alleged to have sent the complaint related to Ajit Pawar’s death to the State CID instead of the proper authorities responsible for handling such matters.

3. Expert Opinions and Analysis: Legal experts and aviation experts have weighed in on the case, suggesting that while the incident was unfortunate, it raises important questions about procedural justice and accountability within the legal system. They emphasize the need for a thorough investigation to avoid any miscarriage of justice due to inadequate procedures at the time.

#### Industry Impact The high-profile nature of this case underscores the importance of proper investigations in preventing future mishaps. It prompts discussions on the necessity of stringent regulations and protocols that ensure prompt, accurate, and unbiased investigations into such incidents. The incident also highlights the challenges faced by legal systems when handling allegations involving prominent individuals.

#### Expert Perspective Rohit Pawar, who was known for his big personality and controversial statements, has taken a public stance accusing Mumbai police of mishandling the case. He believes that the police were negligent in their investigation and have not followed proper procedures.

Expert Opinion: "While the incident occurred due to negligence by the flight crew and possibly some issues with the aircraft itself, it is important to ensure that such incidents do not go unnoticed or remain uninvestigated," said Dr. Ravi Shetty, an aviation expert. He emphasized the need for stringent protocols and clear procedures to prevent future mishaps.

#### What This Means The case serves as a reminder of the importance of proper regulations and protocols in handling investigations into accidents involving prominent individuals. It also highlights the potential consequences if these processes are not followed correctly, leading to legal challenges and public scrutiny.

Looking Ahead: As this case moves forward, it is likely that we will see more detailed reports from the police investigating the incident, possibly including CCTV footage and witness testimonies. The court-monitored probe has been proposed as a mechanism to ensure fairness in the investigation process, which could set an important precedent for future high-profile legal cases.
